Banner.Description: Looking for a skilled and creative Designer and Software Engineer? Look no further! My name is Nehar Harpreet, and I have a passion for combining technical expertise with artistic flair. With a strong background in Computer Science, I'm equipped with the knowledge and skills to bring your ideas to life. I'm always seeking new challenges and opportunities to push my creative boundaries, and my diverse skill set allows me to approach every project with a fresh perspective. Let's work together to create something truly unique and impactful! In the meantime enjoy my portfolio
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: After completing a higher technical school in Computer Science, I'm currently finishing my Bachelor's degree in the same field. In my free time, I love editing pictures and creating my own designs. My diverse skill set allows me to bring a unique perspective to every project I work on.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include:

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Picture Portfolio
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This is my second portfolio which only include picture made by me. Link to the Portfolio

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Modernization of an Frontend
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This project was my diploma project at HTL Spengergasse. As part of a team of four, we collaborated with Vienna Insurance Group (VIG) to modernize their outdated frontend application, which was written in Thymeleaf, to a modern web application. Using Angular, we rebuilt their frontend, and my main task was to ensure the accuracy of data saved to the database through a Docker container, as well as contributing to the development of the frontend.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Voice Banking App Action
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: For my bachelor thesis project, I implemented a proof of concept (PoC) at one of Austria's largest banks, Raiffeisenbank. The project involved developing an Android app action and aimed to integrate voice assistants for customers. The PoC was designed to showcase the potential benefits of using voice assistants in banking, such as improving accessibility and convenience for customers. stripe integration for secure payments. I worked alone on this project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Storybook
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Storybook is a frontend workshop for creating isolated UI components and pages. Many teams use it for development, testing, and documentation of user interfaces. My task where to represent all component that the framework of Raiffeisen. I worked alone on this project
